text: ln yamut 'ahad 'iilaa bi'iidhn allah waqadarah wahataa ystwfy almudat alty qadruha allah lah ktabana mwjjala. wamin yatlub bemlh earad aldnya, neth ma qsmnah lah min rzq, wala hzz lah fi alakhrt, wamin yatlub bemlh aljaza' min allah fi alakhirat nmnhh ma tlbh, wnwth jza'h wafrana mae ma lah fi aldunya min rizq mqswm, fhdha qad shakarana btaeth wjhadh, wasanajzi alshaakirin khyrana
